channel.title: Generic Producer Names
channel.description: I know this is a question that gets posted a lot, but that may be because it's such a key part of the producer inside of all of us. Anyways, I feel like my name is a bit too generic and overused. I've realized this by the fact that whenever I look myself up on SoundCloud, it takes forever for me to find myself. Also, BALLISTIK doesn't really describe me or my music. I'm not going to change it anytime soon, but I just want your opinions. [poll type=regular public=true] * Your name is generic, but still cool. * Your name is generic, and I don't think it fits your music. * Your name is fine, don't change it * Your name isn't important. * Your name is generic and I don't really like it. [/poll]

item.title: Generic Producer Names
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
name isnt the most important thing about being a producer. The more you produce and as you gain more of a following, your name will just feel like it "fits"
at least that’s how i feel about a lot of the artists that i enjoy.

Read full topic

item.title: Generic Producer Names
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
If you decide to change it, I came up with a cool name.

Rave’n.

It’s like raving. The logo could be a colorful raven.

item.title: Generic Producer Names
item.dc:creator: anon73773654
item.description:
It’s a little generic when you think about it, but I don’t think you should change it.

A good way to tell if you name is generic or not is to log out and search it up on SC. If you have t scroll down a lot, you might want to consider a name change. (I’m first in the list of SanaBs lol)

Read full topic

item.description:
Generic is a bit harsh but yeah, doesn’t really fit

Read full topic

item.title: Generic Producer Names
item.dc:creator: BALLISTIK
item.description:
I know this is a question that gets posted a lot, but that may be because it’s such a key part of the producer inside of all of us.
Anyways, I feel like my name is a bit too generic and overused. I’ve realized this by the fact that whenever I look myself up on SoundCloud, it takes forever for me to find myself. Also, BALLISTIK doesn’t really describe me or my music. I’m not going to change it anytime soon, but I just want your opinions.

Click to view the poll.

Read full topic
